尖.definition: pointed; tapering; sharp; (of a sound) shrill; piercing; (of one's hearing, sight etc) sharp; acute; keen; to make (one's voice) shrill; sharp point; tip; the best of sth; the cream of the crop

尖刻.definition: caustic; biting; piquant; acerbic; vitriolic; acrimonious

尖吻鱸.definition: barramundi or Asian sea bass (Lates calcarifer)

尖子.definition: best of its kind; cream of the crop

尖尾濱鷸.definition: (bird species of China) sharp-tailed sandpiper (Calidris acuminata)

尖山.definition: Jianshan district of Shuangyashan city 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

尖山區.definition: Jianshan district of Shuangyashan city 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

尖扎.definition: Jianzha County in Huangnan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 黃南藏族自治州|黄南藏族自治州[Huang2 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

尖扎縣.definition: Jianzha County in Huangnan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 黃南藏族自治州|黄南藏族自治州[Huang2 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

尖沙咀.definition: Tsim Sha Tsui, urbanized area in Hong Kong

尖石.definition: Jianshi or Chienshih township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

尖石鄉.definition: Jianshi or Chienshih township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan

尖端.definition: sharp pointed end; the tip; the cusp; tip-top; most advanced and sophisticated; highest peak; the best

尖細.definition: (of an object) tapered; (of a voice) high-pitched

尖草坪.definition: Jiancaoping district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

尖草坪區.definition: Jiancaoping district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

尖銳化.definition: to intensify; to become acute; to come to a head

尖閣列島.definition: Senkaku Islands (Japanese name for the Diaoyu Islands 釣魚島|钓鱼岛[Diao4 yu2 Dao3]), also known as the Pinnacle Islands
